long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi there! We’re an online vanity and price-monitoring tool for all of your favorite beauty products.

Be sure to register with us at www.prettytracker.com to use the extension most effectively.

Our Google Chrome extension works with your vanity by allowing you to track beauty products from Sephora, Ulta, Macy’s, Target, and Walgreens. When a product you’re tracking goes on sale, we’ll immediately send you an email to notify you of the price drop. This way, you can buy before it’s gone!

Heads up, we are currently in beta and would love to hear your feedback. To do so, click on the bug located on the lower right of your screen to instantly tell us your thoughts.

Happy tracking!
